Class MapObjectStyle

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public abstract class MapObjectStyle
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    Base class for Marker styling on the map.

    • Method Detail

      • isFlat

        public abstract boolean isFlat()
        Whether the marker is drawn flat on the map (so when tilting the map the marker will be tilted too).
        Returns:
        is the marker flat on the map

      • applyTo

        public void applyTo(@NonNull
                    Marker marker)
        Apply this styling to the given marker.
        Parameters:
        marker - the marker on which to apply this styling

      • getAnchor

        @NonNull
public abstract Anchor getAnchor()
        How to position the circle relative to the given point
        Returns:
        the anchor value

      • getOffset

        @NonNull
public abstract android.graphics.Point getOffset()
        Annotation offset in points in screen-space. An offset of {x:10, y:20} will move the annotation 10 points to the right and 20 points down on the screen, while an offset of {x:-10, y:-20} will move the annotation 10 points to the left and 20 points up on the screen. Default is {0, 0}.
        Returns:
        the offset of the marker
